seg.source: 防晒霜包装上一般都标有SPF和PA，SPF是指防晒指数，是针对UVB紫外线的，我们常见的SPF指数有15、30、50等。
seg.translation: The external packaging of sunblock cream is often labeled with SPF and PA. SPF refers to the sun protection factor and specifically targets UVB radiation. Common SPF scores include 15, 30, and 50.
Sunscreen packaging is usually labeled with SPF and PA, SPF refers to the sunscreen index, is aimed at UVB ultraviolet, our common SPF Index has 15, 30, 50 and so on.

seg.source: 标有PA的产品是针对UVA的，这样防晒品会发挥更加有效的作用，通常情况下，PA的强度用+来表示，多一个+表示有效防护时间延长。
seg.translation: Products with the PA label are aimed at UVA. Such sunblocks are more effective. Generally, the strength of PA is indicated by the + sign. Each additional + represents a longer duration of effective protection.
The product labeled PA is aimed at UVA, so that sunscreen will play a more effective role, usually, PA strength with + to indicate, more than one + indicates effective protection time extended.

seg.source: 油性肌肤应选择渗透力较强的水性防晒用品，防晒喷雾也是不错的选择。
seg.translation: For oily skin, choose aqueous sunblock with good penetrability. Sunblock sprays are good options as well.
Oily skin should choose a strong penetration of water-based sunscreen products, sunscreen spray is also a good choice.

seg.source: 干性肌肤应选择霜状的防晒用品;中性皮肤一般无严格规定，敏感性肌肤擦上任何保养品都是一种负担，建议选纯物理性防晒产品。
seg.translation: For dry skin, use cream-based anti-sunburn products. Those with neutral skin are not subject to stringent regulations. However, sensitive skin will find application of any product to be a hard burden. Purely physical sunblock products are recommended.

seg.source: 切记提前半小时涂防晒霜，因为防晒产品需要时间才能完全渗入到皮肤。
seg.translation: Remember to apply the sunblock cream half an hour earlier as the anti-sunburn product needs some time before completely penetrating the skin.
Remember to apply sunscreen for half an hour in advance, as sunscreen products take time to fully penetrate the skin.

seg.source: 军训日晒时间较长，防晒霜每隔两小时擦一次才能有持久效果，千万不要偷懒。
seg.translation: Military training includes extended exposure to solar radiation. Anti-sunburn cream must be applied once every 2 hours to sustain the effects. Don’t get lazy about this.
Military training sun time longer, sunscreen every two hours to wipe once to have lasting effect, do not be lazy.

seg.source: 由于皮肤刚受到日晒刺激的缘故，军训回来不要立刻用美白产品。

seg.source: 军训暴晒后，如有条件可用毛巾包着冰块来冰镇被灼伤的皮肤以减缓局部燥热。
